original_text: then you shall say to them: ‘Because your fathers have forsaken me, declares the Lord, and have gone after other gods and have served and worshiped them, and have forsaken me and have not kept my law,
korean_text: 너는 그들에게 대답하기를 여호와께서 말씀하시되 너희 조상들이 나를 버리고 다른 신들을 따라서 그들을 섬기며 그들에게 절하고 나를 버려 내 율법을 지키지 아니하였음이라

sentences.original_text: then you shall say to them:
Because your fathers have forsaken me,
and have gone after other gods
and have served and worshiped them,
and have not kept my law,
